sentences.sContent: A registered dietitian can give you lots of other snack and menu ideas.
sentences.sContent_eng: A registered dietitian can give you lots of other snack and menu ideas.
sentences.sCn: 你的营养学家会提供给你一份含各种小食的建议菜单。

sentences.sContent: Speak with your physician or dietitian about making sure you are getting adequate nutrients while pregnant and nursing.
sentences.sContent_eng: Speak with your physician or dietitian about making sure you are getting adequate nutrients while pregnant and nursing.
sentences.sCn: 与你的医生或营养学家谈谈，确定在怀孕和哺乳期间，你获取了足够的营养物质。

sentences.sContent: But those astronaut-designed menus must be checked by a dietitian to ensure the astronauts consume a balanced supply of nutrients.
sentences.sContent_eng: But those astronaut-designed menus must be checked by a dietitian to ensure the astronauts consume a balanced supply of nutrients.
sentences.sCn: 但是那些由宇航员自己设计的菜单必须由一位营养学家检查，以确保宇航员营养供给平衡。

words.tran: 规定的食物；饮食的规定
营养学家；膳食学家（等于dietitian）
给…规定饮食；喂食（diet的ing形式）
